revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = Une Baie très énigmatique qui détiendrait le pouvoir des étoiles. |growtime = 1j |harvest = 0,5 baies |replant = 0% |mutation = 0,001% |points = 15 000 |flavor =
*40 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }} '''Enigma''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée à la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en liant votre jeu à un compte [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord], en obtenant 4 indices différents du [[Berry Master/fr|Maître des Baies]] de Kanto et en entourant une parcelle vide avec les baies correspondant à ces indices. Pour lier votre compte Discord, cliquez sur le Menu Démarrer, puis Sauvegarde, cliquez ensuite sur le bouton Lier à Discord. Cela vous redirigera vers une page Discord, cliquez alors sur le bouton Autoriser. Votre sauvegarde est maintenant liée à votre compte Discord. == Tableaux de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |- ! !! Pousse !! Arbuste !! Fleuri !! Mûr |- ! Temps écoulé depuis plantation | 3 heures || 6 heures || 12 heures || 1 jour - 7 jours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Taux de mutation d'Enigma | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0,04% |} ===Temps de croissance avec modificateurs=== {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificateur !! Temps maturité-flétrissement !! Fertibérance nécessaire pour mûrir |- ! Aucun | 1 jour -
7 jours || --- |- ! Engrais ou Kwakarrosoir | 16 heures -
4 jours 16 heures || 192 engrais |- ! Engrais et Kwakarrosoir | 10 heures 40 mins -
3 jours 2 heures 40 mins || 128 engrais |} == Organigramme == [[File:Enigma_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |}
== Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Any Gen 3 or 4 berry can be selected, except the following: * Parasitic berries ([[File:Occa.png|15px]] [[Occa]], [[File:Kebia.png|15px]] [[Kebia]] or [[File:Colbur.png|15px]] [[Colbur]]) * Berries that prevent mutation ([[File:Babiri.png|15px]] [[Babiri]])
Here is a list of berries that can be given as hints: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Berry Gen !! Possible Berries |- | Gen 3 || [[File:Pomeg.png|15px]] [[Pomeg]], [[File:Kelpsy.png|15px]] [[Kelpsy]], [[File:Qualot.png|15px]] [[Qualot]], [[File:Hondew.png|15px]] [[Hondew]], [[File:Grepa.png|15px]] [[Grepa]], [[File:Tamato.png|15px]] [[Tamato]], [[File:Cornn.png|15px]] [[Cornn]], [[File:Magost.png|15px]] [[Magost]], [[File:Rabuta.png|15px]] [[Rabuta]], [[File:Nomel.png|15px]] [[Nomel]], [[File:Spelon.png|15px]] [[Spelon]], [[File:Pamtre.png|15px]] [[Pamtre]], [[File:Watmel.png|15px]] [[Watmel]], [[File:Durin.png|15px]] [[Durin]], [[File:Belue.png|15px]] [[Belue]] |- | Gen 4 || [[File:Passho.png|15px]] [[Passho]], [[File:Wacan.png|15px]] [[Wacan]], [[File:Rindo.png|15px]] [[Rindo]], [[File:Yache.png|15px]] [[Yache]], [[File:Chople.png|15px]] [[Chople]], [[File:Shuca.png|15px]] [[Shuca]], [[File:Coba.png|15px]] [[Coba]], [[File:Payapa.png|15px]] [[Payapa]], [[File:Tanga.png|15px]] [[Tanga]], [[File:Charti.png|15px]] [[Charti]], [[File:Kasib.png|15px]] [[Kasib]], [[File:Haban.png|15px]] [[Haban]], [[File:Chilan.png|15px]] [[Chilan]], [[File:Roseli.png|15px]] [[Roseli]] |}
== Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. Each berry has a 0.04% chance of mutation.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] [[Apicot]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] [[Lansat]] |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |}
==Using Enigma== Farm setups using Enigma can be found here: * [[Farming Setups|Various useful Farming Setups]]
{{Berries}}
[[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = Une Baie très énigmatique qui détiendrait le pouvoir des étoiles. |growtime = 1j |harvest = 0,5 baies |replant = 0% |mutation = 0,001% |points = 15 000 |flavor =
*40 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }} '''Enigma''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée à la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en liant votre jeu à un compte [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord], en obtenant 4 indices différents du [[Berry Master/fr|Maître des Baies]] de Kanto et en entourant une parcelle vide avec les baies correspondant à ces indices.
To link your Discord account, click on Start Menu, then Save, then on the Link Discord button. This will redirect to a Discord page, please click on the Authorize button. Now your save is linked to your Discord account.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Enigma Mutation Odds | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0.04% |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
7 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
4 days 16 hours || 192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
3 days 2 hours 40 mins || 128 mulch |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Enigma_Flow_Chart.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | '''North Hint''' || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- style="height: 50px;" | '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' || || |- style="height: 50px;" | || '''South Hint''' || || '''North Hint''' || |- style="height: 50px;" | || || '''West Hint''' || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || '''East Hint''' |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || '''South Hint''' || |}
== Possible Hints == Due to inconvenience, some berries cannot be selected as hints. Any Gen 3 or 4 berry can be selected, except the following: * Parasitic berries ([[File:Occa.png|15px]] [[Occa]], [[File:Kebia.png|15px]] [[Kebia]] or [[File:Colbur.png|15px]] [[Colbur]]) * Berries that prevent mutation ([[File:Babiri.png|15px]] [[Babiri]])
Here is a list of berries that can be given as hints: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Berry Gen !! Possible Berries |- | Gen 3 || [[File:Pomeg.png|15px]] [[Pomeg]], [[File:Kelpsy.png|15px]] [[Kelpsy]], [[File:Qualot.png|15px]] [[Qualot]], [[File:Hondew.png|15px]] [[Hondew]], [[File:Grepa.png|15px]] [[Grepa]], [[File:Tamato.png|15px]] [[Tamato]], [[File:Cornn.png|15px]] [[Cornn]], [[File:Magost.png|15px]] [[Magost]], [[File:Rabuta.png|15px]] [[Rabuta]], [[File:Nomel.png|15px]] [[Nomel]], [[File:Spelon.png|15px]] [[Spelon]], [[File:Pamtre.png|15px]] [[Pamtre]], [[File:Watmel.png|15px]] [[Watmel]], [[File:Durin.png|15px]] [[Durin]], [[File:Belue.png|15px]] [[Belue]] |- | Gen 4 || [[File:Passho.png|15px]] [[Passho]], [[File:Wacan.png|15px]] [[Wacan]], [[File:Rindo.png|15px]] [[Rindo]], [[File:Yache.png|15px]] [[Yache]], [[File:Chople.png|15px]] [[Chople]], [[File:Shuca.png|15px]] [[Shuca]], [[File:Coba.png|15px]] [[Coba]], [[File:Payapa.png|15px]] [[Payapa]], [[File:Tanga.png|15px]] [[Tanga]], [[File:Charti.png|15px]] [[Charti]], [[File:Kasib.png|15px]] [[Kasib]], [[File:Haban.png|15px]] [[Haban]], [[File:Chilan.png|15px]] [[Chilan]], [[File:Roseli.png|15px]] [[Roseli]] |}
== Additional Mutations == Planting Enigma berries next to certain other berries will cause them to mutate. For all of these mutations, the goal berry must already be unlocked for the mutation to occur. Each berry has a 0.04% chance of mutation.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Original Berry !! Mutated Berry |- | [[File:Passho.png|30px]] [[Passho]] || [[File:Liechi.png|30px]] [[Liechi]] |- | [[File:Shuca.png|30px]] [[Shuca]] || [[File:Ganlon.png|30px]] [[Ganlon]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|30px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Salac.png|30px]] [[Salac]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|30px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Petaya.png|30px]] [[Petaya]] |- | [[File:Chilan.png|30px]] [[Chilan]] || [[File:Apicot.png|30px]] [[Apicot]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|30px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Lansat.png|30px]] [[Lansat]] |- | [[File:Haban.png|30px]] [[Haban]] || [[File:Starf.png|30px]] [[Starf]] |}
==Using Enigma== Farm setups using Enigma can be found here: * [[Farming Setups|Various useful Farming Setups]]
{{Berries}}
[[Category:Farm]][[Category:Berries]]

{{Infobox Berry |name = #67 Enigma |image = [[File:Enigma.png]] |caption = Une Baie très énigmatique qui détiendrait le pouvoir des étoiles. |growtime = 1j |harvest = 0,5 baies |replant = 0% |mutation = 0,001% |points = 15 000 |flavor =
*40 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }}
'''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints.
To link your Discord account, click on Start Menu, then Save, then on the Link Discord button. This will redirect to a Discord page, please click on the Authorize button. Now your save is linked to your Discord account.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 7 days |- ! Animation |

[[File:EnigmaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:EnigmaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Enigma Mutation Odds | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0.04% |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 day -
7 days || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
4 days 16 hours || 192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
3 days 2 hours 40 mins || 128 mulch |}

== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Enigma berries. As the berries needed to be planted are unique to each save file, a general diagram is used here to describe where particular "hinted" berries should go. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.

*40 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }}
'''Enigma''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by linking your game to a [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] account, obtaining 4 different hints from the Kanto [[Berry Master]] and surrounding an empty plot with berries according to those hints.
To link your Discord account, click on Start Menu, then Save, then on the Link Discord button. This will redirect to a Discord page, please click on the Authorize button. Now your save is linked to your Discord account.
